Uses of Class
oracle.dbtools.plugin.api.conf.ConfigurationSetting.Builder

  • Packages that use ConfigurationSetting.Builder 
    Package Description
    oracle.dbtools.plugin.api.conf
    Services for defining and introspecting Configuration Settings

    • Uses of ConfigurationSetting.Builder in oracle.dbtools.plugin.api.conf

      Methods in oracle.dbtools.plugin.api.conf that return ConfigurationSetting.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ConfigurationSetting.Builder ConfigurationSetting.Builder.defaultValue​(java.lang.Object defaultValue)
      Specify the default value of this setting, if no explicit value is found in the Configuration.
      ConfigurationSetting.Builder ConfigurationSetting.Builder.description​(Translatable description)  
      ConfigurationSetting.Builder ConfigurationSetting.Builder.global​(boolean global)
      Specify whether this is a global setting or not
      ConfigurationSetting.Builder ConfigurationSetting.modify()
      Produce a new ConfigurationSetting.Builder instance initialized with the state of this ConfigurationSetting
      ConfigurationSetting.Builder ConfigurationSetting.Builder.secure​(boolean secure)
      Specify whether this setting contains sensitive data such as passwords.
      static ConfigurationSetting.Builder ConfigurationSetting.setting()
      Create a ConfigurationSetting.Builder instance
      ConfigurationSetting.Builder ConfigurationSetting.Builder.status​(ConfigurationStatus status)
      Specify the status of the configuration setting
      ConfigurationSetting.Builder ConfigurationSetting.Builder.type​(java.lang.Class<?> type)
      Specify the data type of the setting
